prompts: Validate the connection to the Firecrawl service.
Search the web for the official homepage of 'Obot AI'.
Scrape the main heading (h1) from https://obot.ai/ in markdown format.
List the first 5 URLs found on https://obot.ai/.
Crawl https://obot.ai/ with a depth of 0 and a limit of 1 page.
Extract the page title and the first sentence from https://obot.ai/.
Check the status of the most recent crawl job.
